mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule SET reason=#{reason}, start=#{start}, `end`=#{end}, `status`=0, `type`=#{type}, user_id=#{userId}, create_time=now(), update_time=now()
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, u.email FROM schedule s LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE s.user_id=#{userId} AND s.type=#{type} ORDER BY s.create_time DESC ;
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE type=#{type} ORDER BY create_time DESC ;
SELECT s.*, u.email FROM schedule s LEFT JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.type = 0 AND s.user_id != #{userId} ORDER BY s.create_time DESC ;
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET status=#{status} WHERE id=#{id}
